Text:
Thanks for the ul.

Just wondering if you're going to ul the following:

Escape of the Living Dead and Plague of the Living Dead?

Both Avatar titles, I believe.

@binderguy1

Absolutely! I'm just trying to spread things out a little bit so it's not just "Living Dead" back to back all of the time. I also plan on uploading "Night of the Living Dead - Aftermath". It will be bundled with night of the living dead One Shots also! and no problem!
